Exception Class

The Exception class is a class used to create exception objects.
The constructor syntax is as follows:

new Exception(<message>)
The message is set in the message property of the created object.
Additionally, the trace property records information such as the functions passed through until the exception occurred (recorded as a human-readable string).
All exception objects that occur due to factors other than the script are objects of the Exception class (for example, division error exceptions, etc.).

More available properties may be added in the future.

message

The message property is a property that represents a string describing the reason for the exception.
